column6: When being a Jedi makes him a target, what can a Padawan do? Betrayed by those he once called friends, young Caleb Dume learns to survive as a smuggler! Continuing the story of the secret origins of Star Wars Rebels' Kanan Jarrus!  Star Wars © Lucasfilm Ltd. & TM. All rights reserved. Used under authorization.
